title: Understanding Inattentivity
text: Inattentivity often leads to challenges in focusing on tasks and following through with instructions. It can affect various aspects of daily life.

hintAnswer: makes it difficult for the individual to organize or finish a task, to pay attention to details, or to follow instructions or conversations
title: Effects of Inattentivity
text: Consider how inattentivity might impact someone's ability to complete tasks or engage in conversations.
choices: distractibility and difficulties with mental focus and working memory
makes it difficult for the individual to organize or finish a task, to pay attention to details, or to follow instructions or conversations
interrupt others, grab things from other people, or speak at inappropriate times
when children have ongoing pattern of aggression toward others with serious violations of rules and social norms at home, at school, and with peers
